gameDetails.name: Mage Wars Academy/Mage Wars: Arena Dice Tower Promo 2016
gameDetails.description:
A pack of 8 promo cards that can be used with either Mage Wars Academy or Mage Wars: Arena originally available as a reward in the 2016 Dice Tower Season 12 Kickstarter.

Promo Cards:


     Bound Healing
     Cowardice
     Miss
     Royal Armorer
     Sanctuary
     Servant of Malacoda
     Silverclaw Ratel
     Stench of Death
